title: BEER & CIDER MENU
subtitle: Explore our curated list of beers and ciders.

items.name: PowerPlant Pilsner
items.description: Pilsner. Floral, herbaceous, low bitterness, cedar notes. Gluten Free. Origin: London, UK

items.name: Metroland Tokyo
items.description: Session IPA. Big hop aroma, drinkable, full flavoured, pineapple & green tea notes. Origin: London, UK

items.name: Hop Hand Fallacy
items.description: Witbier. Soft mouthfeel, low bitterness, citrus, orange peel, coriander. Vegan. Origin: Bristol, UK

items.name: American Pale Ale
items.description: West Coast IPA. Strong hop aroma, intense bitterness, citrus/piney, smooth citrusy, zesty grapefruit. Origin: West Sussex, UK

items.name: Neighbourhood IPA
items.description: West Coast IPA. Strong hop aromas, intense bitterness, citrus/piney notes. Origin: London, UK

items.name: Guinness
items.description: Irish Dry Stout. Dry, coffee-flavoured, creamy texture, dark roasted barley. Origin: Dublin, IE

items.name: Fruh Kolsch
items.description: Kolsch. Bright noble hop aroma, faint fruitiness, light, simple, quaffable, crisp. Origin: Cologne, DE

items.name: Lager
items.description: Pilsner. Balanced, flavorsome, quaffable, soft bitterness, complex aromatics, smooth. Origin: London, UK

items.name: Pacifico Clara
items.description: Mexican Lager. Crisp, refreshing, grass-citrus and ocean mist notes. Origin: Sinaloa, MX

items.name: Pale Ale
items.description: Pale Ale. Dry, light-bodied, showcases varying hops (batch dependent). Origin: Bermondsey, London, UK

items.name: NoMad Mexican Sour
items.description: Gose/Kettle Sour. Salty, high acid, lime peel, margarita profile. Origin: London, UK

items.name: Orval Belgian Ale
items.description: Trappist Ale. Complex aroma of leather, spice, earthy notes. Dry hopped, Brett yeast. Origin: Orval, Belgium

items.name: Fowl Play
items.description: Schwarzbier. Dark lager with coffee, chocolate, citrus notes. Delicate bitterness. Origin: London, UK

items.name: Sassy Organic Cider
items.description: Normandy Cider. Fruit forward, mature fruit, baked apple aromas. Organic. Origin: Normandy, FR

items.name: Sassy Poire Cider
items.description: Perry (Pear Cider). Crisp, fruit forward, fresh pear, white flower aromas. Organic. Origin: Normandy, FR

items.name: Sassy Rose Cider
items.description: Ros√© Cider. Semi-dry/soft, fruit forward, red fruit, apple aromas. Organic. Origin: Normandy, FR

items.name: Superior Unfiltered Lager
items.description: Non-Alcoholic. Unfiltered lager brewed according to Reinheitsgebot. Maximum flavour. Origin: Bavaria, Germany
